message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Alice,  $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  It's a fair price considering the value it holds for both of us.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go below $10,000. This product is high-quality and will serve you well.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $10,000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering we're both looking to make a deal.
